info.name: Discord Simple Clear
info.description: Simple CSS for customizable background and bg opacity. Popular discord styles usually don't work/get abandoned for some reason ??? so I made this one which should be easy to update. Custom bg w/URLs: Upload your img to discord, then use that uploaded bg img URL Github and bg art credits available here
info.additionalInfo:
2-27-21
- Fixed emoji/gif picker and profile pop-up backgrounds
- btw, the owner of this whole website basically left this website to die ðŸ˜’ so i can't promise timely updates to ANY of my styles anymore, and i'll only MAYbe be updating this one and my twt one. bummer, right ðŸ˜ª
